00019         class _BSAPI Emitter : public DeepMemoryPoolObject
00020         {
00021                 // Struct for controlling smooth interpolation of an Emitter member variable.
00022                 struct MemberController
00023                 {
00024                         float time;
00025                         bstype speed;
00026                 };
00027 
00028                 // Emitters can be enabled or disabled by Controllers.
00029                 bool mEnabled;
00030 
00031                 // Controllers for member variables.
00032                 MemberController mMemberControllers[BS_MAX_USER_EMITTER_MEMBERS];
00033 
00034                 // Bitfield for MemberControllers set.  This limits the number of member variables
00035                 // to 32, but this is an acceptable limitation.  In reality, the user can only define
00036                 // up to BS_MAX_USER_EMITTER_MEMBERS members, defined in bsConfig.h.
00037                 uint32 mActiveControllers;
00038 
00039                 int mNumUserMembers;
